author: Graig Graziosi, Graig Graziosi
title: Video shows how coronavirus spreads through the lungs of otherwise healthy people
description: 'For approximately 2 to 4 percent of patients with Covid-19, the damage is irreversible and they will succumb to the disease'
content:
A new video illustrates the way Covid-19 wreaks havoc on the lungs of otherwise healthy individuals. 
The video, created by George Washington University Hospital in Washington DC, shows the lungs of a man who - until a few days prior - had been asymptomatic … [+2306 chars]
